# NWProtocolFramer.Definition

**Class**

A custom protocol definition you use to associate messages with protocol options.

## Declaration

```swift
class Definition
```

## Defining Framer Protocols

- **init(implementation:)**: Initializes a new protocol definition based on your protocol implementation.

## Using Framers with Connections

- **NWProtocolFramer.Options**: A container you use to add your custom protocol to a connection’s protocol stack.
- **NWProtocolFramer.Message**: A message for a custom protocol, in which you can store arbitrary key-value pairs.

## Inherits From

- NWProtocolDefinition

## Conforms To

- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
